statements: DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND pollutant_type = 'CO'
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND latitude > 37.5 AND longitude < -122.5
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM pollution_hotspots WHERE pollution_level_threshold > 50 AND hotspot_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE location = 'London' AND concentration > 50;
DELETE FROM pollution_hotspots WHERE severity = 'High' AND measures_taken = 'Evacuation';
DELETE FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE pollutant_name = 'PM2.5' AND pollutant_level > 50;
DELETE FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE location_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM PollutionHotspots WHERE location = 'Industrial Area'
